headline: Truist Cuts Boston Scientific Corporation (BSX) Price Target but Maintains Buy After Earnings Pullback
summary: Boston Scientific Corporation (NYSE:BSX) is included among 13 Best Long Term Low Risk Stocks to Buy Now. On February 5, Truist lowered its price objective on Boston Scientific Corporation (NYSE:BSX) to $95 from $120. The firm maintained a Buy rating on the stock. In a note to clients, the analyst said the sharp pullback after […]

headline: BWX Technologies Inc. Announces the Opening of its Centrifuge Manufacturing Development Facility in Tennessee
summary: BWX Technologies Inc. (NYSE:BWXT) is included among the 12 Best Nuclear Energy Stocks to Buy Now On January 26, 2026, BWX Technologies Inc. (NYSE:BWXT) announced the opening of its Centrifuge Manufacturing Development Facility in Oak Ridge, Tennessee. The facility is aimed at rebuilding a fully domestic uranium enrichment capability aligned with U.S. national security objectives. […]

headline: Under Armour (UAA) Soars 22% as 2 Analysts Hike PT
summary: We recently published 10 Easy Double-Digit Gainers. Under Armour Inc. (NYSE:UAA) was one of the best performers last week. Under Armour surged by 22.5 percent week-on-week, as investors took path from higher price targets from two investment companies, despite the sports apparel maker’s disappointing earnings performance in the third quarter of fiscal year 2026. In […]
